subsection_content:
We cannot prevent infertility. However, couples can take the following measures to increase their chances of getting pregnant:
For couples: You two should regularly have sex many times during the time of ovulation. This is to increase the highest conception rate. The advice for both of you is to start having sex 5 days before and 1 day after ovulation to improve your chances of getting pregnant.; Men: To limit the risk of infertility, men should avoid smoking and limit alcohol consumption. You should avoid exposure to toxic substances in the living and working environment, and limit the use of drugs that can affect fertility, including both prescription and non-prescription drugs. In addition, you should have a moderate exercise regimen, avoid over-exercising because it will reduce sperm quality.; Women: To increase your chances of getting pregnant, you should limit the use of tobacco, alcoholic drinks, and caffeine. In addition, you should also exercise with moderate intensity and regularly every day. This will help you control your weight well.
The Center's experts and doctors are always confident in mastering the latest techniques, early detecting and effectively treating kidney and urinary tract diseases, helping patients shorten hospital stays and limit risk of recurrence, improving quality of life.
With the leading modern machinery and equipment system in the country and the region; Operating room meets international standards; Along with a 5-star boarding area and high-class service... The Urology and Nephrology Center stands out with examination, screening and treatment services for all urinary tract diseases. From common surgeries to major high-tech surgeries.
These include laparoscopic kidney stone surgery, kidney transplant, tumor resection to preserve kidney parenchyma; Radical nephrectomy; Radical prostatectomy; total bladder resection and small bowel cystoplasty; adrenalectomy; shaping urinary tract defects... Diagnosis - medical and surgical treatment of all diseases.
To schedule an examination and treatment with leading experts at the Center for Urology and Nephrology, Department of Andrology, Tam Anh General Hospital System, you can make an appointment online through the following ways:
Call the hotline 0287 102 6789 - 093 180 6858 (HCMC) or 024 3872 3872 - 024 7106 6858 (Hanoi) to register for a private medical appointment with a specialist, through the customer service staff.; Register for a medical appointment with any doctor you trust at the link: https://tamanhhospital.vn/danh-cho-khach-hang/dat-lich-kham/; Send a message on Tam Anh General Hospital Fanpage or Tam Anh General Hospital Urology and Andrology Fanpage; Text message via Zalo OA of Tam Anh General Hospital.
Infertility is a disease that negatively affects the psychology and quality of life of couples. Therefore, to increase the ability to conceive and preserve family happiness, couples should go for examination and treatment as soon as possible.
